title: 1307Comer Bombshell: Dementia Joe Had ‘No Notes,’ Took No Known Meetings on Autopen Pardons(www.brei
content:
1307 Comer Bombshell: Dementia Joe Had ‘No Notes,’ Took No Known Meetings on Autopen Pardons (www.breitbart.com) 🚨  LOCK THEM UP  🚨 posted 1 day ago by Zacktopia33 82 comments award share report block Exclusive -- Rep. Comer Bombshell: Joe Biden Had 'No Notes,' Took No Known Meetings on Autopen Pardons Monday on "The Alex Marlow Show," Rep. James Comer (R-KY) discussed the Biden pardons. Comer said, "There were no notes of Joe Biden ever sitting on in | Clips www.breitbart.com
